comments: This is an idle game with effort and pretty fun writing, with a lot of ways to feel rewarded without cracking your wallet. It's obviously not the driving game but if you want an idle/clicker, you can't really go wrong with this one. The character diversity is a genuine highlight more games could take a note from.

The fast pace of the game keeps you hooked.  They don't throw ads at you but certainly make them available for great benefits.  It's not clunky at all which makes it easy to pick up and play a couple minutes here and there.  It's a ridiculous concept of making money off taxis/fares, heck I'd move to the cab driver profession if I made >$500 million on one fare... but funny and fun nonetheless.

I really like this game a lot. I'm not usually into these idle games, but from all the ones ive tried. Ive enjoyed this one the most. Other then the occasional slow down, it mostly runs great. And the model for ads is very very fair. If you decide to watch and ad, you always get some kind of reward out of it. But its completely optional.

It's okay and the graphics are really nice, the sound effects are good but ultimately, you play and play and play and play and still not got to the other towns. I've got to about the 7th and had enough of trying to get further and not progressing much. It's okay for a few days but after that, and like someone else has mentioned about the ads, too many to get little rewards

Huge battery drain compared to any other game i have played including the new tekken and sims mobile games which are much more graphical. Will sometimes lose game progress when you completely close the app (so not running in background). Taxi's occasionally get stuck on buildings or vanish off screen completely. If it wasn't for these issues it could be a much better game.

Really fun and adictingl but for samsung galaxy core prime this game has A LOT of bugs and glitches. Tried to play for more than five minutes is making the phone first freeze the screen then restart itself. Some cabs never arrive. Need a lot of bugfixes right now. Other than that it is a good game that i like.

description: Mud. Dirt. Rocks. Multiplayer. Trucks. Customizations. Diesel swaps. Quads. Crawlers. SxS. Free. It goes on and on. Stop reading, just download now!Offroad Outlaws gives you what you want in an off-road game: Complete control over how you build, setup, and drive your rig, tons of challenges to complete, and multiplayer so you can explore the trails on the open-world maps with your friends.MULTIPLAYERExplore the trails with your friends or other players, or battle it out in the capture-the-flag mode! Race up mountains, rock trails, or through rivers with friends!CONTROLYou build your rig the way you want it. You have total control over chassis setup - stiffness, damping, travel, etc... and can even swap to a different type of suspension if you want (want a modern truck with an I-Beam setup in front, and a solid axle in back? No problem.) For vehicle control you're given Tilt, Arrow, or on-screen Steering wheel controls. You choose!DRIVEWith several open world maps to choose from you can drive your rig slow across challenging rock routes, or fast over the flat sands of the desert. Want to take a break from the trails? Go play in the stunt park where you can use the ramps to "test" your rig's durability, or test your drivings skills in the Rock Park.Note: If you choose to join as an Offroad Outlaws member, you are agreeing to an auto-renewing subscription plan that will automatically be charged every month through your account for $4.99. For Privacy Policy visit: http://racerslog.net/ooprivacy.html For Terms and Conditions visit: http://racerslog.net/ooterms.html
descriptionHTML:
Mud. Dirt. Rocks. Multiplayer. Trucks. Customizations. Diesel swaps. Quads. Crawlers. SxS. Free. It goes on and on. Stop reading, just download now!

Offroad Outlaws gives you what you want in an off-road game: Complete control over how you build, setup, and drive your rig, tons of challenges to complete, and multiplayer so you can explore the trails on the open-world maps with your friends.


MULTIPLAYER
Explore the trails with your friends or other players, or battle it out in the capture-the-flag mode! Race up mountains, rock trails, or through rivers with friends!

CONTROL
You build your rig the way you want it. You have total control over chassis setup - stiffness, damping, travel, etc... and can even swap to a different type of suspension if you want (want a modern truck with an I-Beam setup in front, and a solid axle in back? No problem.) For vehicle control you're given Tilt, Arrow, or on-screen Steering wheel controls. You choose!

DRIVE
With several open world maps to choose from you can drive your rig slow across challenging rock routes, or fast over the flat sands of the desert. Want to take a break from the trails? Go play in the stunt park where you can use the ramps to "test" your rig's durability, or test your drivings skills in the Rock Park.

Note: If you choose to join as an Offroad Outlaws member, you are agreeing to an auto-renewing subscription plan that will automatically be charged every month through your account for $4.99. recentChanges: - Optimized levels

comments: I'm honestly about to uninstall. I've been playing 3 days and it's making it impossible to complete the daily task. I can't even invite friends... Edit: it won't allow me to invite friends, I'm able to play one game a day unless I continuously buy more tokens...but with ads after every game, they get funding from them. I installed this game because the reviews were the best, but maybe it's just got a grudge against me!

I understand they are trying to make money off this app, but if you are going to charge someone 320 tickets to play 4 cards, the reward should be more than 70 tickets per win.  I mean, really?! Some people want to play bingo, but want something to work toward without being bored.  I played Bingo story and deleted it, because I had a lot of credits, but EVERY BOARD WAS THE SAME.  Also, the powerups in this game should be limited to what you have available, and not have to purchase because you are out of said power up.  It might make more people play if they are rewarded.  .  I mean the quests saying you will win 600 tickets if you complete the quest, but you're spending on the normal side 280+ tickets, really?  And no other options besides watching ad videos for free credits?  And I'm not saying to add a "download this app and run it for 3 tickets.  Reach level 300 for 40 tickets."  Rant over

Everything would be pretty neat, but there should be another way to get more tickets. I've been stuck at the New York state for several days now, cause I can only replay the first stages with the tickets from the daily bonus.
Love it. The only reason I didn't give 5's across the board is it gets costly per game as you gain levels. The games are way fun and you can play up to 8 cards !!!!!

There should be more ways to get or win more tickets and power-ups. I also think the costs per cards increases too much from board to board. Other than those two issues, I love this game. Would play more if there were other ways to get/win tickets, the purchase costs is ridiculous for the middle/working-class.  I'd rather pay my bills than buy fake in-game tickets that CAN'T win me REAL CASH. Thank you keep up the good work.
It's a fun game. You have to be quick near the end beacause the game seem to end while the caller is still calling the last number. You don't get a penalty for daubing the wrong number.

descriptionHTML:
The ultimate VR Roller Coaster experience. NEW & UPDATED version: one of the most popular VR games just got even better with 3D fantasy ride & alien music ride!

Samsung Galaxy S8 (+) users please make sure to enable WQHD+ resolution for the best experience. Settings > Display > Screen resolution > WQHD+ > APPLY

This game features multiple Virtual Reality (VR) Roller Coaster rides. You're ultimate attraction / theme park VR app is one install click away. Download it now for free.

VR no gyroscope?
No worries we got you covered. If you have a device without any gyroscope sensor please tilt your head left or right to rotate the view. You do not control the vr rollercoaster, but can view 360 degrees during you ride.

Multiple rides
Why settle for one roller coaster if you can enjoy many? Swing by your very own roller coaster park and going to be like being the tycoon of your own theme park and picking your own roller coaster ride when ever you feel like it!
The rides come in different tastes and thrill level from all over the world. Pick a more classic cedar roller coaster edition or take the fastest high speed crazy ride and discover at what point you'll get queasy.
We offer both recorded 360 videos of real rollercoaster rides and NEW an amazing interactive 3D roller coaster ride in a fantasy world that will make your jaw drop!

The 360 video rides come from real life footage making this a roller coaster simulation that is as real as any simulator can get. So download this free VR game now and have your own attraction park in your pocket when ever you feel like taking a roller coaster for a spin. Experience the roller coaster racing down the track at top speed in full 360 VR.

Latest rides
New in the 2017 a ground breaking new 3D VR roller coaster ride that interacts with live music. The all new Alien Music Ride puts you an a both relaxing and high speed ride that interacts and visualizes music. The track has fast ans slow sections and the blend into the environment makes it feel like taking a wingsuite our for a drive on a alien planet. Musically speaking your going to love this as you can first pick a genre including Pop, R&B, or Dance en then start your ride aligned with the music. Please note that where the ride mentions 3D in the top corner of the tile the ride will offer a true 3d experience, as where it mentions Video the ride will be streamed through online video which requires an online Internet connection.

Compatibility
The VR app is optimized for Android mobile phones and the use of Google Cardboard. We aim to support cheap and high-end devices. If you have issues correctly displaying the ride on your headset please first check if you enabled the Cardboard setting for your device correctly. You can usually scan a QR code to automatically enable the setting for your headset. Our known compatibility includes: VRTX One, Stooksy, VR KiX, Durovis Dive, Merge VR, Refugio 3D, ANTVR, VR Smartview, ColorCross, VRTRIA, FIBRUM VR, VR View-Master, Nibiru. Please contact us if you have any issues.
Furthermore you can use this app to enjoy the rides without any VR headset through touch controls as well.

If you like VR apps and games, and specifically thrilling VR Roller Coaster rides then this is a must download for you. 5, 4, 3, 2, 1... Get into the VR groove and claim your free VR Roller Coaster now!

description: In the future, a strong, outstanding species is created from the combination of humans, technology and black metal.The government names them “shadow cyborg”, and allows every sector to have their own shadow security force (S.E.F), but all of theme have to be controlled by the Headquarter placed in Century city.Everything seems so perfect, til the day Headquarter is under attacked by a Dark Clan.CORE, a senior cyborg soldier discovers the plot too late.The Lord Commander of S.E.F is hacked, he slays his soldier and replace them by new shadow cyborg generation to take over the government.After the attack, CORE joins the rebel and heads to the city seeking revenge for his comrades and destroying the Dark Clan. Overdrive is a combination hack n slash and action platformer with many weapons available: sword, buster sword, spear, twin dagger...with unique built-in combos.Starting from the Dark Forest, you will face dangerous enemies and traps. In the fight, use your skill to avoid attack and make extraordinary combos.FEATURES of Overdrive - Ninja Shadow Revenge game:- Tutorial for newbie makes sure every player can know how to play - Playable OFFLINE- Smooth game control experience- Discover poweful combos in each weapon, make game full of fun and suprising.- Upgrade, customize & equip your hero with epic weapons & armor suits and more!- Ultra-stunning scifi graphic & effect - Giant boss with unique attack.FIGHTING of Overdrive game:- The screen’ll locked when enemies appear in the screen & you need to destroy numerous waves of enemies to continue going ahead.- Using avoiding skills to survive? Killing enemies madly?- Exploting traps & platforms to kill them?- There are many strategies to handle them.ADVENTURE & STORY:- Not only combat but also challenge your self to complete each level with many dangerous platforms.  VARIOUS WEAPONS:- Using different weapons ( Sword, Buster Sword, Spear,...) with their perfect combos bring unforgetable hack and slash game experience.- Players can pick their best weapons and also upgrade weapons to unlock new stronger combos. GRAPHIC & SOUND:- Amazing scifi high quality graphic makes sure you will be suprised.- It’s 2 available modes to set suitable graphic for your phone.SO YOU GONNA BE THE HERO WHO SAVES THE WORLD? ENJOY NOW!Have any question or feedback to make the game better? Please let us know.Contact us via: Email: gms.mobilegame@gmail.comFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/mobilearcadegame/
descriptionHTML:
In the future, a strong, outstanding species is created from the combination of humans, technology and black metal.
The government names them “shadow cyborg”, and allows every sector to have their own shadow security force (S.E.F), but all of theme have to be controlled by the Headquarter placed in Century city.
Everything seems so perfect, til the day Headquarter is under attacked by a Dark Clan.
CORE, a senior cyborg soldier discovers the plot too late.
The Lord Commander of S.E.F is hacked, he slays his soldier and replace them by new shadow cyborg generation to take over the government.
After the attack, CORE joins the rebel and heads to the city seeking revenge for his comrades and destroying the Dark Clan.
Overdrive is a combination hack n slash and action platformer with many weapons available: sword, buster sword, spear, twin dagger...with unique built-in combos.
Starting from the Dark Forest, you will face dangerous enemies and traps. In the fight, use your skill to avoid attack and make extraordinary combos.

FEATURES of Overdrive - Ninja Shadow Revenge game:
- Tutorial for newbie makes sure every player can know how to play
- Playable OFFLINE
- Smooth game control experience
- Discover poweful combos in each weapon, make game full of fun and suprising.
- Upgrade, customize & equip your hero with epic weapons & armor suits and more!
- Ultra-stunning scifi graphic & effect
- Giant boss with unique attack.

FIGHTING of Overdrive game:
- The screen’ll locked when enemies appear in the screen & you need to destroy numerous waves of enemies to continue going ahead.
- Using avoiding skills to survive? Killing enemies madly?
- Exploting traps & platforms to kill them?
- There are many strategies to handle them.

ADVENTURE & STORY:
- Not only combat but also challenge your self to complete each level with many dangerous platforms.

VARIOUS WEAPONS:
- Using different weapons ( Sword, Buster Sword, Spear,...) with their perfect combos bring unforgetable hack and slash game experience.
- Players can pick their best weapons and also upgrade weapons to unlock new stronger combos.

GRAPHIC & SOUND:
- Amazing scifi high quality graphic makes sure you will be suprised.
- It’s 2 available modes to set suitable graphic for your phone.

SO YOU GONNA BE THE HERO WHO SAVES THE WORLD? ENJOY NOW!

Have any question or feedback to make the game better? Please let us know.
Contact us via:
Email: gms.mobilegame@gmail.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/mobilearcadegame/

70 Bowman St.
South Windsor, CT 06074

descriptionHTML:
Roll up on a dangerously fun, wildly expansive, and overwhelmingly rich trip to the City of Sin!
Enjoy everything Vegas has to offer, from shooting up rival gangs and stealing cars to race down the strip, to pushing your luck at the casino and customizing your threads. You can even take off into the sky as you explore every inch of this criminal paradise.

WELCOME TO OUTRAGEOUS LAS VEGAS
√ Play as a mixed martial arts (MMA) fighting star whose dreams of becoming a Battle Royale champ clash with a world of theft, gang wars, zombies and more in a BLOCKBUSTER STORY MODE.
√ Fight your way through 80 MISSIONS filled with action, auto races, shooting and more. Use your skills and your brain to counter every challenge they throw at you.
√ Build up clans of criminals to strike from the shadows against your many enemies.

ENDLESS SANDBOX FUN
√ Explore a BIGGER CITY, 9x the size of the previous Gangstar game, for a ridiculously fleshed-out mobile world where you’ll always find something new to do and thefts to commit.
√ Perform awesome stunts with ragdoll effects that are as fun to see succeed as they are to watch fail horribly, thanks to amazing use of the HAVOK PHYSICS engine.
√ Watch your name climb the Leaderboards as you overcome grand CHALLENGES including air, water and street auto races, MMA fights, FPS showdowns & more!
√ Become Vegas's finest sniper by shooting it up in Carnage & Heist modes.
√ Break the bank as you kill it in addictive CASINO GAMES. Theft isn’t the only way to make the big bucks!

RIDE ON THE WILD SIDE
√ Access INSANE WEAPONS like Molotov cocktails, long-range sniper rifles, flamethrowers & an electric guitar! Choose the right one to counter any threat.
√ Stay mobile as you drive CRAZY VEHICLES including monster trucks, muscle cars, tanks & fighter jets. So strap in -- there’s no auto-pilot for these dogs of war!
√ UPGRADE YOUR SKILLS for more deft theft, sharper sniper strikes, and better race-car control.
√ CUSTOMIZE YOUR GEAR and look like anything you wish: a mechanized robot, boxing champ, shambling zombie, etc.

BEYOND THE MORTAL COIL

√ Kill zombies, try boxing with robots, and even strike out against the shadow clans of HELL itself as your story takes you to unbelievable locations.

THE STORY:
In this third-person shooting game, you play as a rising MMA champion. Framed by the mafia, you are supposed to throw your bout at the fighting event of the year. But when your opponent beats you to the punch and goes down first, famous gang lord Frank Veliano’s perfect plan goes down too. You have just become the most wanted man in the city. In a dog-eat-dog world where crime is everywhere, you will have to hold your gun tight to combat the wildest gang ever!
Welcome to Las Vegas, where fortunes are made and lives are lost with a roll of the dice!

For fans of FPS action, auto racing, driving (autos or tanks), robots, zombie clans, games with car theft, and free mobile games.

This game supports smartphones and tablets running Android 2.3 and up.

comments: Almost two years later and still love the game. It is a good game to relax to. I do spend money occassionally on the game but the game is not "pay to play". That means you can progress through it without even spending a dime. Its a simple game with decent graphics to play at leisure and has become my current pass time.  Update 3/22/18  I decreased my rating to three stars (from 5) until the developer can correct the latest flop from most recent update. Flop regards being able to log in but paralyzed from any action that requires an in game pop up. I including the "Help" module which is used to contact dev with. If no improvement after a week, I will delete game and draw stars to 0.

I've always loved this game, but my tickets go ignored for days. Latest update has handicapped me completely in that I cannot click on anything or log off 1 world to log onto my other world. The game is starting to suffer because of bad customer service. Reduced my rating to 1 star until they get their act together. To think I've actually spent real money on this game and can't get a timely answer.
The latest update has locked me out of the ability to select anything. Its like pop ups have been disabled. I used real money in this game and now i cant play.Fix it please! Samsung note 4

I hate to leave 1 star just to get a developer's attention, but I have been unsuccessful in contacting customer support. Since the update, buttons in Uceria are no longer clickable. I cannot even access the second world I play in because I am locked into Uceria. I have uninstalled and reinstalled,but still does not work. Please help!
Downgraded to 1 star until the latest bug is fixed. Frustrating to say the least!
please add full screen view! after last update game keeps crashing! please fix it!

descriptionHTML:
Come and play Forge of Empires! Take control over a city and become the leader of an aspiring kingdom. Guide it through the ages, research new technologies, expand your empire and live through an epic story. Battle other players and prove your skills as king and warlord.

FEATURES

- Build your city and evolve from the Stone Age to modern times (and beyond).
- Develop new technologies and discover new buildings and goods
- Produce supplies to manufacture goods
- Exchange your goods and trade with your neighbors
- Discover new territories and seize control of the provinces and their rewards
- Use your negotiation or battle skills to take over sector by sector

Forge of Empires is based on our successful browser strategy game which was published by InnoGames, developers of fantasy strategy game Elvenar, in the summer of 2012. Finally, the online strategy game is available for Android as well, providing cross-platform access.

Forge of Empires is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in­app purchases in your device's settings. A network connection is also required.

comments: Overall great game as far as playing is concerned. Major thing that could use work is matchmaking. Currently an 89 overall getting matched against 98-105 overall players. No chance to win and may discourage some people from playing the game. The gameplay is awesome and I have lots of fun, 100% worth your time if you avoid Head-to-head or tournaments (unless you have money or don't mind being poorly matched).

This is my full honest review. Madden Mobile is back!! I'll admit before it was not fun and I complained that you need to pay to win but EA really did good when I came back to play. The game is fun and is somewhat easy to get 100 overall players and now they are bringing back Draft Champs and I have seen early drafts and it looks great. The promos are great. I would like to say great job EA on bringing this game back and making it fun. I always want to play everyday and build my Ultimate Team

I have played this game for 3 seasons now.  I can't even begin to say all that is wrong, but one of the things that stands out most to me, is that your players stats mean nothing.  You spend a lot of time and effort completing events and grinding, and improve your team only to find out that when you play a team way below your level, it seems that that teams players are much faster and tend to play way above their ability.  this game seems to have the liberal bug that everyone is equal.  I am done with this game, don't get caught up with it, it's not worth the waste of your time

Thanks alot EA for this new head to head style. Great to know that all the grinding and work put in is only allowing those who have a 100 overall or better reap the rewards. Everytime playing one of these individuals they have a counter for every single play. This really turns me off to the game.

For the person hoping to find Madden 18, this is the closest thing you are gonna get. Yes, it doesn't have practice mode or my player mode, but it DOES have a incredible roster of players that you bargain for. The graphics are pretty good for a game on a smartphone.  Overall, this game is a MUST HAVE for NFL fans. 10 outta 10.

You know I really like all of the Live Events but when I get these old collectible cards that aren't worth anything I have to cut them one by one. It takes way too long and I've got over a hundred. I would suggest having a way to group delete or in Madden terms "cut" the old dead weight.

comments: Thank u guys for this game. Best wolf game I've ever played. Highly addictive. Thank u so much.   If u can, it would be nice to be able to make people into friends and pack mates. Edit: thanks for that. Its better than I imagined.  Being able to mate and having to take care of pups would be cool. Like how they have Co-op and PvP tabs, maybe u can have another tab that says survival or something. It can kinda be a mixture of both Co-op and Pvp. Every wolf can be an enemy or a friend. You'd have to hunt and drink to survive or die from lack of it. You and your pack has to protect the pups and keep everyone fed. Maybe there can be weather and habitat differences. Night and day changes. And u have to survive with your pack in the snow, the mountains, the desert, the forest, or in a really big map that has all of it. Idk but it would make having a mate and a pack actually mean something. And taking care of pups would be nice. Just a suggestion. Hope u guys consider it.

OMG love this game so much. For me being up north is amazing u can see real wolves but this game takes it to a new level. I love it so much the pride of the pack is great not only that u can talk to people it's super fun. I'm more of a northern girl I don't like the city but this game is so much like home when I play it while I'm away from home it makes me happy

I LOVE IT AND MADE LOTS OF FRIENDS!! This game is awesome and is time killing too! I love the song when you click the game and it's loading! I also love the wovles too! The only thing I wish it has is more then two places to go...it's the same maps over and over and it's ok I just think there should be more maps or something but over all I love it!! It's amazing! One of my favorite games! You have to play it.

I love that you can use powers but I think there should be more wolf species and more places you can go like the city the artic or the deserts also can you put a large boss so everyone in co-op can kill it and it's really strong so hackers carnt do it themselves. It would be nice to see low level people and high level people hanging out like level 50s and level 10s. Also I wish there was a single player mode other than that make more games!! Like the deer or a Fox in a farm the den could be an abandoned dog den. Make a deer online its been my dream. Plus I have all the games you have made so far. Plz hurry and make a new game now!!!

Pretty chill game 👌👌👌 The way you earn points in PVP is pretty cool too. If you kill someone, you get points depending on how high their level is. If you help to kill them you don't get as much points but you still get some. I haven't experienced any glitches yet. Comtroller can be slightly annoying when trying to escape, but other that that it's cool. ⭐🌟⭐🌟⭐

Giving it 2 stars because I get lag spikes every second for a couple seconds. I can't play like that. Giving it 2 stars only cuz its a game I would play daily. Shame, btw I'm using Note 7 so such a game even on high should run 60fps. I'm on very low and still getting lag spikes.
description: Dive into the world of wild wolves and live your life as one of them! The best wolf RPG on mobile is finally here. Explore the amazing environment, develop your character and upgrade your skills to become the Alpha of your pack! You can try your strength in one of two modes: CO-OP or PVP - everything in Online Real-Time Multiplayer. Play with people from all over the World!  Online Real-Time Multiplayer RPG Stunning 3D graphicsBeautiful environmentRealistic animalsCharacter development and upgradesCooperative multiplayer hunting and PVP Battle Arena modesSmooth performanceONLINE MULTIPLAYER SIMULATORCompete with players from all around the World! The wilderness is never empty. Meet other wolves in real time and conquer the forest!CHARACTER CUSTOMIZATIONAre you a mighty Gray Wolf? A Dhole Wolf? Or maybe a mysterious Black Wolf resembles you the most? Choose your favorite and create your unique character!RPG SYSTEMYou are the king of your own destiny! There is no imposed path to follow in this simulator. Decide which attributes to develop and which skills to upgrade to become the Alpha of the pack!AMAZING GRAPHICSEnjoy the stroll around the map and admire the stunning environment! Starting from your den all the way to the mountains and streams, the high-end graphics make the game incredibly pleasant. Don’t the animals look realistic? Try and chase them all!VARIOUS GAME MODESHunting mode lets you explore the map while searching for prey: from rats and rabbits, through does, foxes and racoons, all the way to bisons and bulls. Cooperate with other players to fight the strongest opponents! If you need a bigger thrill, join the Battle Arena mode - you will be teamed up with other wolves to compete with another pack. This means war!

Realistic animals
Character development and upgrades
Cooperative multiplayer hunting and PVP Battle Arena modes

Are you a mighty Gray Wolf? A Dhole Wolf? Or maybe a mysterious Black Wolf resembles you the most? Choose your favorite and create your unique character!

RPG SYSTEM

You are the king of your own destiny! There is no imposed path to follow in this simulator. Decide which attributes to develop and which skills to upgrade to become the Alpha of the pack!

AMAZING GRAPHICS

Enjoy the stroll around the map and admire the stunning environment! Starting from your den all the way to the mountains and streams, the high-end graphics make the game incredibly pleasant. Don’t the animals look realistic? Try and chase them all!

VARIOUS GAME MODES

Hunting mode lets you explore the map while searching for prey: from rats and rabbits, through does, foxes and racoons, all the way to bisons and bulls. Cooperate with other players to fight the strongest opponents! If you need a bigger thrill, join the Battle Arena mode - you will be teamed up with other wolves to compete with another pack. This means war!

comments: Great Game This game it truley fun to play! I don't understand why the rating is so low for it. The graphics are amazing and I like that you can connect with friends and play together. Honestly even though its a great game I wish we didn't have to wait to get more tokens to play. However if you really like the original game board Monopoly, than I suggest you get this app!! Don't judge a game by its rating!! ((;

Computers players dice rolls feel manipulated. Also needs speed play to eliminate animations and skip to result of computers turn for faster rounds. Boring waiting for computer players to end their turns. Need more explanation of chance cards and swap options. Good concept and sound.. good graphics.. Stamps collected should literally be stamps in passport book.. not chips that doesn't make sense. Anyways I like it but the dice rolls feel pretty fishy.

Needs more coins Game definitely would be a favorite of mine but the lack of coins is a bit disappointing considering how much fun it really is. 1or2 coins just isn't enough and needs some of the authenticity of the old board game Incorporated into it to make for longer gameplay. Hotels, community chest, ect. Then you would have my 5 🌟's.

Good but what's the point? Good gameplay. Good graphics. Quicker than actual monopoly to play... However there is no incentive to win... No leader board, no win lose stats, no rewards, no unlockables... Nothing. So who cares if you come second third or fourth (that's just a loss) ... It should have win 25 games and unlock a different board or background or dice... The game would be worth 5 stars if it gave you reason to play.

Format is good, ability to play the game fairly is poor. Several times I've had a card played against me and did not know, so I couldn't use the 'just say no' card I had. Other times I've tried to use a card in the 3 seconds you get to react, but despite pushing the green tick to activate it - did not work. I lost the last game with 3 cards that I tried to use but couldn't...   Oh yeh, I bought 2 other versions of Monopoly on my galaxy 4 that I can't use on my galaxy 6, so I won't be buying this one..

Could be better I like the concept... you have to wait entirely too long for your coins to regenerate.  Also why can't we play with random people online?  Good game over all but not worth 4 bucks for unlimited play with what is offered.  Basically you can play once per day smh... rethink this please then maybe I will rate it better or even buy it.  Why make it a free game and you really can't play

comments: Going to give up on this game I have been made to watch the same 30 second ad every other turn. More than half of the time I play this game is the black panther film ad, how many times do I have to watch the same ad...ridiculous overkill. There is no way I will go and see that film now because  your barrage of ads has made me annoyed at the mention of it.

Possibly the worst app I have ever used. Memory hungry, battery draining - the phone actually gets hot! - and you are held to ransom by endless boring repetitive ads, or you pay through the nose to avoid them. But it's Scrabble, a great game, so what can you do? You learn to ignore the ads.    Too many silly words are allowed these days, so it's easier to play, but it remains a great game despite the shortcomings of this due app. But there are far too many adverts.

Notifications don't work. Adverts interfere with game play. Games do not load or refresh properly (seems to be due to loading adverts timing out). Just an awful experience. If EA had any decency they'd make a single payment purchase option for Android users to remove adverts.

Would be 5 stars if I could lose the ads I can deal with ads you can shut off... Having to watch a video is ridiculous. Rather pay a fiver for the app than watch a gin advert 50 times Oh and why is pilates not in the dictionary? It's in Collins online?

Overall, I would not download this game for the following reasons.  Firstly, how come so many words are not recognized? Seriously, June is not a valid word, so are there only 11 months in the year then? However, words like upta do!   Secondly, this app drains battery life as though is using your phone to power a planet. You need to invest in your own power station, if you want to play this game for 10 -15 min sessions.  Thirdly, even for a free app there are too many adverts. I actually forgot I was playing a game and was about to open a bag of popcorn for the feature movie to begin.  Will be uninstalling now.

Forget the ads, the app is very annoying. Its is plagued with connectivity issues. Ads loads first (at the bottom) before your pending Scrabble games is updated...and that is IF the game lists updates without resulting in network error. Often, it will need repeated restarts to update the list or starting a new random online game to force it.  I cannot recommend this app to first timers because it is frustrating. The Scrabble game cannot be enjoyed as EVERYTHING must be online...even Solo play. Look elsewhere until issues are addressed.

description: New Update—The Wolf's Dawn Awakens[Game Description]“Honkai, the mysterious power that has destroyed human civilization many times before has now descended once again on this beautiful world—”With the lands now crawling with deadwalkers and Honkai beasts, a group of girls bearing the burdens of despair continue their fight onward. Will there be any hope of clinging to survival?Players will take on the role as captain of the mighty battleship Hyperion, commanding an elite team of Valkyries in battle against the Honkai in a variety of stages, experiencing different storylines, and fighting for all that is beautiful in the world![Update Features][Wolf's Dawn Awakened Form]Covered in the white of snow, the Hyperion’s undefeated Silverwolf of the Urals takes on a new form as she is awakened.Steeped in violence, was this life meant to be one of eternal solitude and killing as a weapon?Could admitting the former self lead to rebirth at dawn?Bronya’s awakened forms—Rank S [Black Nucleus], and Rank A [Wolf's Dawn] join the fight![Dormitory Party - Time to Move In]Would you like to decorate a dormitory and interact with the cute Valkyries up close?St. Freya Real Estate Co. is proud to announce the opening of the Valkyrie Dormitory!Choose from a variety of styles and move in right away![Select Dreamland]Who… who am I?This action figure-like creature, have I seen it before? I can’t remember…That lonely, cold, dark past… was it all just a dream?Captain… Please use the Bronya’s power to help Bronya to escape from the prison of her dreamland.The Bronya of the present cannot be lost to the Bronya of the past.[Chapter 5 Now Open]Bronya secretly followed Theresa into the Schicsial’s data center, and what appeared before her eyes was the snowfields of Siberia in the year 2000.The bonds of blood, selfless sacrifice, and fate are all reunited.A new story and a new enemy waits for captains to explore and battle![Support]If you encounter any problems while playing Honkai Impact 3, please contact the support center in-game and send us your feedback!Player support links:honkai3rd_asia@mihoyo.comOfficial website: http://asia.honkaiimpact3.com/Official Facebook fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/HonkaiImpact3rd
descriptionHTML:
New Update—The Wolf's Dawn Awakens

[Game Description]
“Honkai, the mysterious power that has destroyed human civilization many times before has now descended once again on this beautiful world—”
With the lands now crawling with deadwalkers and Honkai beasts, a group of girls bearing the burdens of despair continue their fight onward. Will there be any hope of clinging to survival?
Players will take on the role as captain of the mighty battleship Hyperion, commanding an elite team of Valkyries in battle against the Honkai in a variety of stages, experiencing different storylines, and fighting for all that is beautiful in the world!

[Update Features]
[Wolf's Dawn Awakened Form]
Covered in the white of snow, the Hyperion’s undefeated Silverwolf of the Urals takes on a new form as she is awakened.
Steeped in violence, was this life meant to be one of eternal solitude and killing as a weapon?
Could admitting the former self lead to rebirth at dawn?
Bronya’s awakened forms—Rank S [Black Nucleus], and Rank A [Wolf's Dawn] join the fight!

[Dormitory Party - Time to Move In]
Would you like to decorate a dormitory and interact with the cute Valkyries up close?
St. Freya Real Estate Co. is proud to announce the opening of the Valkyrie Dormitory!
Choose from a variety of styles and move in right away!

[Select Dreamland]
Who… who am I?
This action figure-like creature, have I seen it before? I can’t remember…
That lonely, cold, dark past… was it all just a dream?
Captain… Please use the Bronya’s power to help Bronya to escape from the prison of her dreamland.
The Bronya of the present cannot be lost to the Bronya of the past.

[Chapter 5 Now Open]
Bronya secretly followed Theresa into the Schicsial’s data center, and what appeared before her eyes was the snowfields of Siberia in the year 2000.
The bonds of blood, selfless sacrifice, and fate are all reunited.
A new story and a new enemy waits for captains to explore and battle!

[Support]
If you encounter any problems while playing Honkai Impact 3, please contact the support center in-game and send us your feedback!
Player support links:
honkai3rd_asia@mihoyo.com

Official website: http://asia.honkaiimpact3.com/
Official Facebook fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/HonkaiImpact3rd
recentChanges: 1. New characters [Black Nucleus] and [Wolf's Dawn] join the battle.
2. New Extra Chapter "Bronya - Select Dreamland."
3. New collection of weapons and stigmata.
4. New Final HOMU Fantasy event stage.
5. All new “Valkyrie Dorm” game feature.
6. Opened Chapter 5 of the main storyline.
summary: Life is reborn as the Wolf's Dawn awakens!Attack the Honkai and save the world!
title: Honkai Impact 3

comments: I think that it's a good game worth downloading to try. It is a big jump from Smashy Road: Wanted, to Smashy Road: Arena. My favorite thing about this game is that you can customize your car to suit your personality. I would LOVE this if you could customize and add guns to a version more like Smashy Road: Wanted. The reason being that in Smashy Road: Wanted, there is no boundaries, but there is also no customizable cars... If there was a hybrid version with no boundaries and customizable cars I would be hyper! Thanks, TheWetBandits

This game is very fun and addicting, has a great art style, and most importantly I can play with my friends. One thing that I would add is a setting to disable the 2D pixels on the ground when you drive off-road. To me, they do not look like they fit the art style. Another thing to fit the art style  more would be to add more maps that look more like Smashy Road: Wanted. Overall, I give this game a 4/5 rating.

It is a #1 game I've played. There is 1 little problem. The cops just corner my legendary truck into the corner of the map and push me into the water. I love blowing em up and tricking them so they drive into the water. I will r8 5 stars if this is fixed. Either way, it is a really good game. I recommend this to everybody. My bro even plays it too! I'm sure he'll leave a rating too!

I've changed my mind the controls and graphics are good to ok to bad.  THE ONLINE IS SO TRASH. YOU KEEP GOING IN AND OUT OF GAMES YOU SWITCH PLAYERS YOU GET TELEPORTED. besides all that single player is boring and online is frustrating. Uninstalled instantly

Some of the cars are hard to control and some dont do their abilities. For example the digger was my favorite car for starters on smashy road because if cops go high speed at your front hood of the car, it would act as a ramp and cops would fly over you.

The multiplayer has to many glitches. I always lose a round because of the swapped glitch. Whenever I die and try to swap at the same time, I keep on falling off the map when I respawn. 4 or 5 stars if you fix this.
